author: pdobacz
content: <@393119312350543872> this is the ethereum/tests PR which needs refilling (which you offered to do IIUC :), for which I'm very thankful). I can also work on resolving the `retesteth` failure (in the PR), but I'd need some pointers.

author: dimitry8570
content:
Ah no. Blockchain and state tests we can't fill for osaka and prague. Because there is no support for blockheader fields and eips.

Only eof test format we can.

author: dimitry8570
content: The state tests / blockchain must be migrated to .py

author: dimitry8570
content: Do you also want to support Prague revision?

author: chfast
content: Not really, we just need Osaka. We can patch existing JSON by changing Cancun/Prague → Osaka. Migration is also planned. But because EEST uses Osaka for EOF already, your coverage script will not work.

author: chfast
content: Also, please consider merging https://github.com/ethereum/tests/pull/1404: some tests less to care about.
